DataShape.description: Statistics across folds of various metrics
DataShape.name: AnalyticsValidationMetricsStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the percent of records that were correctly predicted (BOOLEAN, CATEGORICAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: accuracyStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the area under the ROC curve (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: areaUnderCurveStats

FieldDefinition.description: Matrix of statistics across folds for each confusion matrix entry (BOOLEAN, CATEGORICAL, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: confusionMatrixStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the number of records observed false but predicted true (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: falsePositiveRateStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the Matthews Correlation Coefficient which is a comparison of true and false positives with true and false negatives (BOOLEAN, CATEGORICAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: mccStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the linear correlation between actual and predicted scores (-1 to 1, where 0 = no correlation and -1 or 1 = high correlation) (CONTINUOUS, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: pearsonCorrelationStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the Precision or Positive Predictive Value which represents the fraction of true positives from positive instances predicted (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: precisionStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the Recall, Sensitivity, or True Positive Rate which represents the fraction of true positives from total positive instances (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: recallStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the Root Mean Squared Error with scores normalized between 0 and 1 (CONTINUOUS, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rmseNormalizedStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the Root Mean Squared Error which is the standard deviation of the differences between actual and predicted scores (CONTINUOUS, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rmseStats

FieldDefinition.description: List of statistics across folds of the ROC pairs used to build the ROC curve
FieldDefinition.name: rocCurveStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the modified R-Squared value which takes into account the number of predictors used in the model (CONTINUOUS goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rSquaredAdjustedStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the measure of how well a model fits to data (CONTINUOUS goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rSquaredStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the Specificity, or True Negative Rate which represents the fraction of true negatives from total negative instances (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: specificityStats

FieldDefinition.description: Statistics across folds of the number of records observed true and predicted true (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: truePositiveRateStats
